languages.text: As long as Cassia remains in the party, this amulet grants both the Rogue Trader and Cassia +<u>(Cassia's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

traits.locale_text: As long as Cassia remains in the party, this amulet grants both the Rogue Trader and Cassia +<u>(Cassia's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> to all their characteristics.

As long as Cassia remains in the party, this amulet grants both the Rogue Trader and Cassia +<u>(Cassia's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

As long as Cassia remains in the party, this amulet grants both the Rogue Trader and Cassia +<u>(Cassia's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

languages.text: Пока Кассия присутствует в отряде, этот амулет дает Вольному Торговцу и самой Кассии +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}ВОЛ{/g} Кассии)</u> ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g}.
languages.original_text: As long as Cassia remains in the party, this amulet grants both the Rogue Trader and Cassia +<u>(Cassia's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

languages.text: Solange Cassia in der Gruppe bleibt, gewährt dieses Amulett {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} und Cassia +<u>(Cassias {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WK{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> auf alle ihre Eigenschaften.
languages.original_text: As long as Cassia remains in the party, this amulet grants both the Rogue Trader and Cassia +<u>(Cassia's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Solange Cassia in der Gruppe bleibt, gewährt dieses Amulett sowohl dem Freihändler als auch Cassia +<u>(Cassias {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WK{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> auf alle ihre Eigenschaften.

languages.text: Tant que Cassia fait partie du groupe, cette amulette confère {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} et à Cassia +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g} de Cassia)</u> à toutes leurs {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g}.
languages.original_text: As long as Cassia remains in the party, this amulet grants both the Rogue Trader and Cassia +<u>(Cassia's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Tant que Cassia fait partie du groupe, cette amulette confère au Libre-Marchand et à Cassia +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}FM{/g} de Cassia)</u> à toutes leurs caractéristiques.

languages.text: 只要卡西娅留在队伍里，这件护身符就可以使行商浪人与卡西娅的所有属性提高<u>（卡西娅的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>点。
languages.original_text: As long as Cassia remains in the party, this amulet grants both the Rogue Trader and Cassia +<u>(Cassia's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> to all their characteristics.

traits.locale_text: 只要卡西娅留在队伍里，这件护身符就可以使行商浪人与卡西娅的所有属性提高<u>（卡西娅的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>点。

languages.text: Mientras Cassia forme parte del grupo, el amuleto les otorga a ella y a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente + <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g} de Cassia)</u> a todas las {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g}.
languages.original_text: As long as Cassia remains in the party, this amulet grants both the Rogue Trader and Cassia +<u>(Cassia's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Mientras Cassia forme parte del grupo, el amuleto les otorga a ella y a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente + <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g} de Cassia)</u> a todas las características.

languages.text: カシアが部隊にいる限りこのアミュレットは、ローグトレーダーとカシアの両者の全ての特性を<u>(カシアの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>分だけ増加する。
languages.original_text: As long as Cassia remains in the party, this amulet grants both the Rogue Trader and Cassia +<u>(Cassia's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> to all their characteristics.

traits.locale_text: カシアが部隊にいる限りこのアミュレットは、ローグトレーダーとカシアの両者の全ての特性を<u>(カシアの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>分だけ増加する。

languages.text: Bu uğurluk, Cassia grupta olduğu sürece hem Hür Tacir'in hem de Cassia'nın tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} +<u>(Cassia'nın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İRA{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g})</u> kazandırır.
languages.original_text: As long as Cassia remains in the party, this amulet grants both the Rogue Trader and Cassia +<u>(Cassia's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.
